description: SLAMDUNK is a fusion of style, sportsmanship and athleticism. An inter-collegiate, invitational basketball tournament for men and women, SLAMDUNK attracts professional basketball teams of the highest caliber from all over the country.
Battle it out at the Eastern and Western Solo Singing competitions where the best in the country vie for the coveted title.
A test of lit-skills including crossword, jumble, anagrams and other word games.

A Model United Nations (MUN) is, as its name suggests, a simulation of the functioning of the United Nations. Students step into the shoes of delegates from different parts of the world, and try to look for solutions to problems that we face today. It is a one-of-its-kind experience promoting leadership skills and spirit of teamwork.
A bunch of short super random competitions. Win cool prizes really quick. Just walk in and have fun.

This happening event pushes photo enthusiast from all over the nation to put their best clicks forward. This one-of-a-kind event entertains photographers of many categories including naturalism, black and white, shutterbug etc. To be a part of this event, submit your clicks to email ids below with your details (Name, Branch, College, Contact number and Email ID) by 25th February 2012. We are open to any form of photography and have a very generic theme. All entries will be screened and the best will be displayed for 5 days starting 29th February 2012, during Incident.
FIFA, DotA, Counter Strike and Need for Speed. Come battle it out!
A mix of games such as charades, picto, grids and rebuses, to find the most versatile literary enthusiasts.

Create the queerest and impossible story with your imaginary super- heroes and villains and we are ready to believe you. Here in the first half of the strip tease the participants can draw anything and everything. In the second half all the participants will be randomly clubbed to form several groups and each group will have to come up with a cartoon strip tease using the characters drawn by them during the first half.

A Model United Nations (MUN) is, as its name suggests, a simulation of the functioning of the United Nations. Students step into the shoes of delegates from different parts of the world, and try to look for solutions to problems that we face today. It is a one-of-its-kind experience promoting leadership skills and spirit of teamwork.

Bring out the child in you and gain more knowledge through the fun filled trivia. These are based on amateur photography and are more fun than technical. Top scorers will be rewarded. To register, send your details (Name, Branch, Year, College, Email ID, and Contact Number) to any of the email addresses below. Spot registrations will also be open.
The sands, the shore, the lighthouse, the crashing waves and a picture-perfect sunset. India's only campus with a private beach brings you pulsating music, kite- speckled sky and fun games.

Want to relive your child hood days of playing with sand, splashing in the sea water or soaking in the sun. Consider your wish granted at the Incident 2012. We have a wholesome package of all such possible fun activities at Sandemonium.

SLAMDUNK is a fusion of style, sportsmanship and athleticism. An inter-collegiate, invitational basketball tournament for men and women, SLAMDUNK attracts professional basketball teams of the highest caliber from all over the country.
Lights! Camera! Strut! Set the ramp on fire with your stylish attitude. It's not just about fashion.
